interface.name: EAP_ChecklistReadOnlyGrid
interface.description: Display Checklist in Read only grid based on Checklist Type
interface.definition: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridField_v1"( data: ri!refChecklist, columns: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"( label: "Checklist Type", sortField: "checklistType", value: fv!row.checklistType, align: "START", showWhen: false ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"( label: "Checklist Desc", sortField: "checklistDesc", value: fv!row.checklistDesc, align: "START" ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"( label: "Sort Order", sortField: "sortOrder", value: fv!row.sortOrder, align: "END", width: "NARROW_PLUS" ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"( label: "Is Active", sortField: "isActive", value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"( value: { if( fv!row.isActive = true(), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextIcon"( icon: "check-circle", caption: "Active", color: "POSITIVE", size: "MEDIUM" ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextIcon"( icon: "times-circle", caption: "In-Active", color: "NEGATIVE", size: "MEDIUM" ) ) }, align: "CENTER" ), align: "CENTER", width: "NARROW_PLUS" ) }, pageSize: 10 )
